messages.content: "You can make a real difference at this election by helping to elect the first Green MP in the North. Sheffield Central deserves an MP who will work hard for our city and stand up for the things that matter to you. The Tories cannot win here – this is a straight choice between me and Labour – make your vote count!"

mentions.candidate: I've been working with many groups, like the Sheffield Needs a Pay Rise campaign, to support an embattled oppressed region that has suffered from low pay, campaigning against Tory and Labour spending cuts.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Tories cannot win here – this is a straight choice between me and Labour – make your vote count!
mentions.partyLeader: I came to Sheffield after six years living in London as the national leader of the Green Party.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Greens finished a clear 2nd in the 2015 general election and closed the gap on Labour in 2017.

issues.education: I will work hard in the constituency for the goal of halting the unnecessary closure of our schools
issues.environment: Fighting for strong action on climate change. Protecting wild moorlands and supporting flood prevention in Sheffield.
issues.labourEmployment: I've been working with many groups, like the Sheffield Needs a Pay Rise campaign, to support an embattled oppressed region that has suffered from low pay. Campaigning against Tory and Labour spending cuts for more than a decade.
